title: Kamal haasan clarifies that the poem doing rounds in whatsapp under his name is not writtenby him - Tamil Movie News
text: Kamal Haasan's message to public ahead of Sasikala DA case verdict Ulaganayagan Kamal Haasan has been facing flak from a section of Tamil Nadu's ruling party politicians and huge support of youngsters and film industry celebrities for his open and bold statements about the current political situation. Miscreants and rumormongers who are eager to exploit any situation to get entertained by causing problems to celebrities have now tried to drag Kamal into another controversy. A Tamil poem with allegedly objectionable verses has been doing rounds in WhatsApp under the name of Kamal. However the multi-talented actor has noticed this and has promptly clarified that the said poem is not written by him. He has also asked the one who wrote it under his name to apologise for writing it. Whatsappல்நீள்கவிதைஎன்பெயரில்உலாவருகிறது. தவறுசெய்தால்ஒப்புக்கொள்வேன். அந்தத்தப்புஎனதல்ல.செயதவர்துணிந்துமன்னிப்புக்கேட்கவும்
